summary: This is an email chain from September 2020 between FBI personnel discussing an investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell. It references a KIK messenger subpoena that provided an email address linked to a username associated with Maxwell, and includes attachments such as a case summary and screenshots of a conversation between a victim's mother and Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses an investigation into Maxwell, linking a KIK messenger username and email address to her. Screenshots of a conversation between her and a victim's mother are referenced.

persons.name: ADA
persons.context: Provided information confirming that a profile photograph from a KIK account matches Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: The ADA provided information to FBI investigators confirming the identity of a KIK account as belonging to Maxwell.

events.title: Case summary provided to FBI
events.description: An FBI agent sends a summary of the case regarding Ghislaine Maxwell to another agent.

events.title: Request for investigation documents
events.description: An FBI agent requests additional information including the target email address, documents tying it to Maxwell, and case attachments.

events.title: KIK messenger information provided
events.description: An FBI agent provides information from a KIK messenger subpoena showing an email address and username 'SW' linked to Maxwell, along with screenshots of a conversation.

locations: FBI - New York Office Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force / Squad C-20
keyFacts: A KIK messenger subpoena provided an email address linked to a username 'SW' that investigators associate with Ghislaine Maxwell.
The profile photograph from the KIK account was confirmed by an Assistant District Attorney (ADA) to match Ghislaine Maxwell.
Attachments included screenshots of a conversation between a victim's mother and Ghislaine Maxwell.
One attachment contained a partially nude image of a minor, explicitly noted as not being child pornography.
The communication shows FBI agents in the Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force actively investigating Maxwell in September 2020.
